title: Italian Food & Wine Escape in Historic Assisi, Perugia
description: Experience the history, authentic Italian cuisine and wine of the beautiful Umbria region staying at Valle de Assisi, nestled in the countryside of Assisi between Florence and Rome. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, two indulgent three-course dinners with a glass of wine each, a nightly glass of wine or soft drink each, a wine-tasting experience, spa access and a credit towards an authentic Italian cooking class.
offer_address: Via S. Bernardino Da Siena, 116, 06081 Santa Maria degli Angeli PG, Italy
